abilities.name: Evolutionary Gas
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), when you play Skuntank from your hand to evolve 1 of your Active Pokémon, you may choose 1 of the Defending Pokémon. If that Pokémon tries to attack during your opponent's next turn, that attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Poison Claws
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Plunder
attacks.effect: Before doing damage, discard all Trainer cards attached to the Defending Pokémon.
